name: OpenSea
description: OpenSea is the world's first and largest web3 marketplace for NFTs and crypto collectibles. Browse, create, buy, sell, and auction NFTs using OpenSea today.

name: blur
description: Sweep NFTs across multiple marketplaces, snipe reveals faster than others, and manage your portfolio with advanced analytics. Zero fees.

name: magiceden
description: Magic Eden is the leading community-centric NFT marketplace. Home to the next generation of creators. Discover the best and latest NFT collections today.

name: Rarible
description: Discover, sell and buy NFTs on Rarible! Our aggregated NFT marketplace for Ethereum NFTs and Polygon NFTs powers brands, collections and creator marketplaces.

name: Immutable zkEVM
description: Immutable zkEVM is a chain for games that offers EVM compatibility, low cost, massive scale, and Ethereum security. Cutting-edge technology in gaming with a largest ecosystem in web3

name: NFTX
description: NFTX is a platform for making ERC20 tokens that are backed by NFT collectibles.
